July 8 (Reuters) - 3I Infrastructure PLC 3IN.L:: *3I INFRASTRUCTURE PLC - TOTAL INCOME AND NON-INCOME CASH WAS £22 MILLION IN QUARTER, IN LINE WITH OUR EXPECTATIONS *3I INFRASTRUCTURE PLC - ON TRACK TO DELIVER A FY22 DIVIDEND TARGET OF 10.45 PENCE PER SHARE, UP 6.6% FROM FY21


((Reuters Investor Briefs; email: reutersinvestor.briefs@thomsonreuters.com)) Source Date/Time = 08-JUL-202106:00:04 GMT
